description.translate: Challenges the most reckless, like those whose lives have no meaning.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Corps sans âge\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Défie-les plus téméraires, comme\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ceux dont la vie n'a pas de sens.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Challenges the most reckless, like\"}","{\"text\":\"§7those whose lives have no meaning.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a2 §7HUN§a1 §7STR§c-1\"}"],color:2127385}}
